widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos= (20, 0), size=(848, 75), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_WRAP, text = 26), # Index 26 is the current directory + the current file. { "templates": { # Simple help with no headings ("flat") # data[1:] = [helpText] "default": (56,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 0), size=(650, 56), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), ] ), # Simple help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText] # For help entries "default+headings": (56,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 0), size=(650, 56), font=0, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(28, 0), size=(652, 56), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), ] ), # Extended help with no headings # data[1:] = [helpText, extendedHelpText] "extended": (165,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 0), size=(650, 79), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 80), size=(650, 90), color=0x009e9fa4, color_sel=0x009e9fa4, font=3, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text=2), ], ), # Extended help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText, extendedHelpText] # For help entries "extended+headings": (165,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos=(5, 0), size=(650, 170), font=0, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=1), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(28, 0), size=(652, 56), font=1, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=2), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(28, 60), size=(652, 90), color=0x009e9fa4, color_sel=0x009e9fa4, font=3, flags=RT_WRAP | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text=3), ], ), }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30), gFont("Regular", 26), gFont("Regular", 26), gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 55 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130, 33), size = (15, 33), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # Current Service MultiContentEntryText(pos = (163, 2), size = (628, 35), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 2), # Servicename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (163, 39), size = (628, 32), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 3), # Eventname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (163, 73), size = (628, 29), font = 3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # Eventtime MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (15, 14), size = (110, 66), png=6, flags = BT_SCALE) # picon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 34), gFont("Regular", 30), gFont("Regular", 27), gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 110 }
